first_para: William Neil Carmichael (born 15 April 1961 in Hexham) is an English Conservative Party politician. He has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for the Stroud constituency in Gloucestershire since the 2010 general election.

full.extract: William Neil Carmichael (born 15 April 1961 in Hexham) is an English Conservative Party politician. He has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for the Stroud constituency in Gloucestershire since the 2010 general election.
full.title: Neil Carmichael (Conservative politician)
